Posts.EditableText:
I cannot create games in Quest. When I try, no matter the language, type or name, it says that an error occurred while processing my request. 

I have tried multiple days, with gamebooks and text adventures. I even tried setting the language of the text adventure to French.

Nothing worked.
Please help.
Posts.HTML:
I cannot create games in Quest. When I try, no matter the language, type or name, it says that an error occurred while processing my request.

I have tried multiple days, with gamebooks and text adventures. I even tried setting the language of the text adventure to French.

Nothing worked.
Please help.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

You have to use "https" instead of the default "http".

https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/site/topic/t9fy6k4fwu2cunjxlibapw/tip-use-https-to-access-online-quest-stuff
